<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 220 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made of elemental salts and essences from the [Inner Sphere](/Rules.aspx?ID=307) or where such planes leak onto [the Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26), _fundamental oil_ is anathema to elementals and other creatures with a weakness to elemental damage. A weapon anointed with this oil acts as [_bane oil_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2068) to elementals, but the damage type is the same as the target’s greatest weakness if the target has [weakness](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. If it has none of these, the additional damage is the same type as the weapon’s damage type. These effects last 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
